description: Erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side of the existing back addition; replacement of external staircase with a metal spiral staircase at first floor level down to garden level and repositioning from the side elevation of the existing back addition to the rear elevation of the proposed side extension; formation of a platform on the flat roof of the proposed single storey side extension to provide access from the existing door to the side elevation at first floor level to the proposed metal spiral staircase to the rear elevation of the proposed side extension; formation of a courtyard between the rear of the main building and proposed side extension; replacement of an existing window with French doors to the rear elevation of the main building within the proposed courtyard; and replacement of existing window and door to the rear elevation at ground floor level with bi-folding doors.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
